title: Wyverní ostrov
content:
Wyverní ostrov can be found in the north central part of the bažiny outside Wyzima, between the Druidský hájek and the Mágova věž, north of the pohřebiště golemů. It features, not surprisingly, a healthy colony of wyvern. V Kapitola II, only regular wyvern are in evidence, but in Kapitola III, the královská wyverna are there, led by Moa, an ancient female.

Úkoly
Dravá wyverna
Zakázka: wyverny
Zakázka: královské wyverny
